solution_line_template: She has {num_hens} hens that lay {eggs_per_hen_per_day} eggs a day so they lay {num_hens}*{eggs_per_hen_per_day} = <<{num_hens}*{eggs_per_hen_per_day}={eggs_per_day}>>{eggs_per_day} eggs a day

The hens lay {eggs_per_day} eggs a day and she wasn't able to collect them for {days_gone} days so that means there are {eggs_per_day}*{days_gone} = <<{eggs_per_day}*{days_gone}={total_eggs_uncollected}>>{total_eggs_uncollected} eggs

Her neighbor took {neighbor_took} off the {total_eggs_uncollected} eggs so that leaves {total_eggs_uncollected}-{neighbor_took} = <<{total_eggs_uncollected}-{neighbor_took}={eggs_after_neighbor}>>{eggs_after_neighbor} eggs

Myrtle dropped {myrtle_dropped} of the remaining {eggs_after_neighbor} eggs so she has {eggs_after_neighbor}-{myrtle_dropped} = <<{eggs_after_neighbor}-{myrtle_dropped}={final_eggs}>>{final_eggs} eggs
